meta.name: description
meta.content: The official website of Northwest Independent School District, a public school district in North Texas that serves families in 234 square miles.

div.a: MENU

div.script: components.addItem("unifiedPublishingAlert");

p.span: During this challenging time, Northwest ISD is committed to supporting our students and families. Our curriculum and instruction department, with support from our building principals and input from teachers across the district, have designed our new iNvest2Learn website with enrichment learning opportunities for students to use during our closure. These learning opportunities focus on reinforcing and enriching skills and knowledge that students have previously learned, and are designed to be fun and engaging. These are optional activities and will not be graded. However, we encourage students to spend as much time as they want to on them over the next two weeks while our schools are closed.

You can access this wide variety of learning opportunities by clicking the iNvest2Learn link and logo at the top of this section. On this website, you will see we have included technology-based activities as well as traditional, (non-technology) types of activities.

div.hr: Once every decade, the United States government conducts a census to create an accurate count of people living in the United States. This count is vital in determining how federal resources are allocated to areas across the country, from representation in Congress to how much federal funding is directed to communities. This year's census will be available online or via phone responses as well as the existing paper option. Visit www.census.gov for more information.

div.div: Register your child for school and find a list of resources and documents needed.
div.a: Read About Enroll My Child for School

div.div: NISD is 234 square miles and is one of the fastest growing districts in the area. Learn where your child will go to school here
div.a: Read About Attendance Boundaries

div.div: See what’s cooking in NISD cafeterias, and add money to your child’s account
div.a: Read About Lunch Menus

div.div: With more than 7,000 active parent volunteers, you make a difference. Complete a background check, and start volunteering today.
div.a: Read About Volunteer in NISD

div.div: Are you new to Northwest? This web page will help you navigate your way around NISD
div.a: Read About New to NISD

div.div: Get details about activities, events, and opportunities available for your child in the NISD community.
div.a: Read About Our Community Folder

div.div: As a service to Northwest ISD students, parents, and community, the district provides the Community Folder for non-school groups or organizations to post information that may be of interest or a benefit to students and families.
div.a: Read About Community Folder

div.div: The Northwest ISD Partners in Education program creates school-support opportunities for parents, businesses and the community by offering a wide variety of options amenable to every schedule, talent and expertise. PIE brings volunteers and mentors into Northwest ISD classrooms at each campus and all grade levels.
div.a: Read About Partners in Education

div.div: Northwest ISD serves 14 communities, spans three counties and covers 234-square miles.
div.a: Read About Communities We Serve

div.div: NISD is not responsible for content on external websites.

div.a: Privacy Policy | Terms of Use

div.div: NISD affirms its commitment to ensuring people with disabilities have an equal opportunity to access online information and functionality. If you believe any online information or functionality is currently inaccessible, contact Melissa Shawn, communications and web specialist at 817-215-0135 or mshawn@nisdtx.org.
